pages.text: Fusion Reactor Controllers are part of the $(l:multiblocks/fusion)Fusion Reactor$(/l) multiblock. Each $(l:multiblocks/fusion)Fusion Reactor$(/l) require one Fusion Reactor Controller.$(p)The Fusion Reactor Controller allows you to view a GUI that provides information about the $(l:multiblocks/fusion)Fusion Reactor$(/l), e.g. injection rate.
The controller is also where you will insert $(l:chemicals/dt_fuel)D-T Fuel$(/l) filled (10mB) $(l:items/hohlraum)Hohlraums$(/l), a necessary item to start the ignition.
